patthana22.9:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.9:4.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.9:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
